title: 299L.05 GAMBLING VIOLATIONS; RESTRICTIONS ON FURTHER ACTIVITY.
text: An owner of an establishment is prohibited from having lawful gambling under chapter 349 conducted on the premises, or selling any lottery tickets under chapter 349A, if a person was convicted of violating section 609.76, subdivision 1, clause (7), or 609.76, subdivision 2, for an activity occurring on the owner's premises.
